main event: Two Air Force officers observed an unidentified object hovering at an altitude of 7,500 feet for over an hour before it suddenly accelerated and disappeared near Meridian, Mississippi on August 8, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted over an hour before the object disappeared., The object was hovering at an altitude of 7,500 feet., The report includes investigation by the 8202 Air Base Squadron., The sighting was radar confirmed., The object was described as having no sound or exhaust.
